verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said בִּלְעָם֙ <WH1109> And Balaam אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּלָ֔ק <WH1111> unto Balak בְּנֵה־ <WH1129> Build לִ֥י בָזֶ֖ה <WH2088> here שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> me here seven מִזְבְּחֹ֑ת <WH4196> altars וְהָכֵ֥ן <WH3559> and prepare לִי֙ בָּזֶ֔ה <WH2088> here שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> me here seven פָרִ֖ים <WH6499> oxen וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> and seven אֵילִֽים׃ <WH352> rams

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> did בָּלָ֔ק <WH1111> And Balak כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> had spoken בִּלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> as Balaam וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> offered בָּלָ֧ק <WH1111> and Balak וּבִלְעָ֛ם <WH1109> and Balaam פָּ֥ר <WH6499> a bullock וָאַ֖יִל <WH352> and a ram בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> on [every] altar

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said בִּלְעָ֜ם <WH1109> And Balaam לְבָלָ֗ק <WH1111> unto Balak הִתְיַצֵּב֮ <WH3320> Stand עַל־ <WH5921> beside עֹלָתֶךָ֒ <WH5930> by thy burnt offering וְאֵֽלְכָ֗ה <WH1980> will go אוּלַ֞י <WH194> perhaps יִקָּרֵ֤ה <WH7136> will come יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> peradventure the LORD לִקְרָאתִ֔י <WH7125> to meet וּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> me and whatsoever מַה־ <WH4100> He יַּרְאֵ֖נִי <WH7200> he sheweth וְהִגַּ֣דְתִּי <WH5046> me I will tell לָ֑ךְ וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went שֶֽׁפִי׃ <WH8205> to an high place

וַיִּקָּ֥ר <WH7136> met אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> about בִּלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> Balaam וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> seven הַֽמִּזְבְּחֹת֙ <WH4196> altars עָרַ֔כְתִּי <WH6186> unto him I have prepared וָאַ֛עַל <WH5927> and I have offered פָּ֥ר <WH6499> a bullock וָאַ֖יִל <WH352> and a ram בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> upon [every] altar

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> put יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> a word בְּפִ֣י <WH6310> mouth בִלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> in Balaam's וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> and said שׁ֥וּב <WH7725> Return אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּלָ֖ק <WH1111> unto Balak וְכֹ֥ה <WH3541> thus תְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> and thus thou shalt speak

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> And he returned אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold נִצָּ֖ב <WH5324> unto him and lo he stood עַל־ <WH5921> beside עֹלָת֑וֹ <WH5930> by his burnt sacrifice ה֖וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> he and all the princes מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said מִן־ <WH4480> from אֲ֠רָם <WH758> me from Aram יַנְחֵ֨נִי <WH5148> hath brought בָלָ֤ק <WH1111> Balak מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab מֵֽהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> out of the mountains קֶ֔דֶם <WH6924> of the east לְכָה֙ <WH1980> Come אָֽרָה־ <WH779> curse לִּ֣י יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> me Jacob וּלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> and come זֹעֲמָ֥ה <WH2194> defy יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

מָ֣ה <WH4100> How אֶקֹּ֔ב <WH5344> shall I curse לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall I קַבֹּ֖ה <WH6895> hath not cursed אֵ֑ל <WH410> whom God וּמָ֣ה <WH4100> How אֶזְעֹ֔ם <WH2194> ? or how shall I defy לֹ֥א <WH3808> not זָעַ֖ם <WH2194> hath not defied יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [whom] the LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> from מֵרֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> For from the top צֻרִים֙ <WH6697> of the rocks אֶרְאֶ֔נּוּ <WH7200> I see וּמִגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> him and from the hills אֲשׁוּרֶ֑נּוּ <WH7789> I behold הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold עָם֙ <WH5971> him lo the people לְבָדָ֣ד <WH910> alone יִשְׁכֹּ֔ן <WH7931> shall dwell וּבַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among the nations לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִתְחַשָּֽׁב׃ <WH2803> and shall not be reckoned

מִ֤י <WH4310> Who מָנָה֙ <WH4487> Who can count עֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> the dust יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וּמִסְפָּ֖ר <WH4557> and the number אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֣בַע <WH7255> of the fourth יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel תָּמֹ֤ת <WH4191> crying נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> any מ֣וֹת <WH4194> the death יְשָׁרִ֔ים <WH3477> of the righteous וּתְהִ֥י <WH1961> become אַחֲרִיתִ֖י <WH319> and let my last כָּמֹֽהוּ׃ <WH3644> be like

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said בָּלָק֙ <WH1111> And Balak אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> unto Balaam מֶ֥ה <WH4100> What עָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> What hast thou done לִ֑י לָקֹ֤ב <WH6895> thee to curse אֹיְבַי֙ <WH341> mine enemies לְקַחְתִּ֔יךָ <WH3947> unto me? I took וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> behold בֵּרַ֥כְתָּ <WH1288> and behold thou hast blessed בָרֵֽךְ׃ <WH1288> [them] altogether

וַיַּ֖עַן <WH6030> And he answered וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said הֲלֹ֗א <WH3808> not אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what יָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> hath put יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that which the LORD בְּפִ֔י <WH6310> according אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> אֶשְׁמֹ֖ר <WH8104> Must I not take heed לְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> to speak

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> then בָּלָ֗ק <WH1111> And Balak [לְךָ־ כ] (לְכָה־ <WH1980> come ק) <WH1980> come אִתִּ֜י <WH854> for אֶל־ <WH413> about מָק֤וֹם <WH4725> place אַחֵר֙ <WH312> I pray thee with me unto another אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תִּרְאֶ֣נּוּ <WH7200> from whence thou mayest see מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אֶ֚פֶס <WH657> but קָצֵ֣הוּ <WH7097> the utmost תִרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> them thou shalt see וְכֻלּ֖וֹ <WH3605> all לֹ֣א <WH3808> and will not תִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> part of them and shalt not see וְקָבְנוֹ־ <WH6895> them all and curse לִ֖י מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּקָּחֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH3947> And he brought שְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> him into the field צֹפִ֔ים <WH6839> of Zophim אֶל־ <WH413> to רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> to the top הַפִּסְגָּ֑ה <WH6449> of Pisgah וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH1129> and built שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> seven מִזְבְּחֹ֔ת <WH4196> altars וַיַּ֛עַל <WH5927> and offered פָּ֥ר <WH6499> a bullock וָאַ֖יִל <WH352> and a ram בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> on [every] altar

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּלָ֔ק <WH1111> unto Balak הִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> Stand כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> here עַל־ <WH5921> beside עֹלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5930> by thy burnt offering וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> myself אִקָּ֥רֶה <WH7136> while I meet כֹּֽה׃ <WH3541> [the LORD] yonder

וַיִּקָּ֤ר <WH7136> met יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> Balaam וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and put דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> a word בְּפִ֑יו <WH6310> in his mouth וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> and said שׁ֥וּב <WH7725> Go again אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּלָ֖ק <WH1111> unto Balak וְכֹ֥ה <WH3541> and thus תְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> and say

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> And when he came אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him וְהִנּ֤וֹ <WH2009> behold נִצָּב֙ <WH5324> to him behold he stood עַל־ <WH5921> beside עֹ֣לָת֔וֹ <WH5930> by his burnt offering וְשָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and the princes מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ בָּלָ֔ק <WH1111> with him And Balak מַה־ <WH4100> What דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto him What hath the LORD

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said ק֤וּם <WH6965> Rise up בָּלָק֙ <WH1111> Balak וּֽשֲׁמָ֔ע <WH8085> and hear הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <WH238> hearken עָדַ֖י <WH5704> against בְּנ֥וֹ <WH1121> unto me thou son צִפֹּֽר׃ <WH6834> of Zippor

לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> [is] not a man אֵל֙ <WH410> God וִֽיכַזֵּ֔ב <WH3576> that he should lie וּבֶן־ <WH1121> neither the son אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man וְיִתְנֶחָ֑ם <WH5162> that he should repent הַה֤וּא <WH1931> has He אָמַר֙ <WH559> hath he said וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> and shall he not do וְדִבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> [it]? or hath he spoken וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor יְקִימֶֽנָּה׃ <WH6965> and shall he not make it good

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold בָרֵ֖ךְ <WH1288> [commandment] to bless לָקָ֑חְתִּי <WH3947> Behold I have received וּבֵרֵ֖ךְ <WH1288> and he hath blessed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot אֲשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7725> and I cannot reverse

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor הִבִּ֥יט <WH5027> He hath not beheld אָ֙וֶן֙ <WH205> iniquity בְּיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> in Jacob וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor רָאָ֥ה <WH7200> neither hath he seen עָמָ֖ל <WH5999> perverseness בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֙ <WH430> his God עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וּתְרוּעַ֥ת <WH8643> [is] with him and the shout מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of a king בּֽוֹ׃
אֵ֖ל <WH410> God מוֹצִיאָ֣ם <WH3318> brought them out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כְּתוֹעֲפֹ֥ת <WH8443> he hath as it were the strength רְאֵ֖ם <WH7214> of an unicorn לֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> there לֹא־ <WH3808> is no נַ֙חַשׁ֙ <WH5173> Surely [there is] no enchantment בְּיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> against Jacob וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor קֶ֖סֶם <WH7081> neither [is there] any divination בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel כָּעֵ֗ת <WH6256> according to this time יֵאָמֵ֤ר <WH559> it shall be said לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> of Jacob וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> and of Israel מַה־ <WH4100> what פָּ֖עַל <WH6466> wrought אֵֽל׃ <WH410> What hath God

הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold עָם֙ <WH5971> Behold the people כְּלָבִ֣יא <WH3833> as a great lion יָק֔וּם <WH6965> shall rise up וְכַאֲרִ֖י <WH738> himself as a young lion יִתְנַשָּׂ֑א <WH5375> and lift up לֹ֤א <WH3808> It will not יִשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> he shall not lie down עַד־ <WH5704> until יֹ֣אכַל <WH398> until he eat טֶ֔רֶף <WH2964> [of] the prey וְדַם־ <WH1818> the blood חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> of the slain יִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> and drink

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said בָּלָק֙ <WH1111> And Balak אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> unto Balaam גַּם־ <WH1571> not קֹ֖ב <WH6895> them at all לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִקֳּבֶ֑נּוּ <WH5344> Neither curse גַּם־ <WH1571> again בָּרֵ֖ךְ <WH1288> nor bless לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תְבָרֲכֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH1288> them at all

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> But Balaam וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּלָ֑ק <WH1111> unto Balak הֲלֹ֗א <WH3808> not דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <WH1696> Told אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> not I thee saying כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> speaketh יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> All that the LORD אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> אֶֽעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> that I must do

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said בָּלָק֙ <WH1111> And Balak אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> unto Balaam לְכָה־ <WH1980> come נָּא֙ <WH4994> Please אֶקָּ֣חֲךָ֔ <WH3947> I pray thee I will bring אֶל־ <WH413> about מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> place אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> thee unto another אוּלַ֤י <WH194> perhaps יִישַׁר֙ <WH3477> convenient בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> affliction הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God וְקַבֹּ֥תוֹ <WH6895> that thou mayest curse לִ֖י מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> brought בָּלָ֖ק <WH1111> And Balak אֶת־ <WH853> בִּלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> Balaam רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> unto the top הַפְּע֔וֹר <WH6465> of Peor הַנִּשְׁקָ֖ף <WH8259> that looketh עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> toward הַיְשִׁימֹֽן׃ <WH3452> Jeshimon

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said בִּלְעָם֙ <WH1109> And Balaam אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּלָ֔ק <WH1111> unto Balak בְּנֵה־ <WH1129> Build לִ֥י בָזֶ֖ה <WH2088> here שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> me here seven מִזְבְּחֹ֑ת <WH4196> altars וְהָכֵ֥ן <WH3559> and prepare לִי֙ בָּזֶ֔ה <WH2088> here שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> me here seven פָרִ֖ים <WH6499> bullocks וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> and seven אֵילִֽים׃ <WH352> rams

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> did בָּלָ֔ק <WH1111> And Balak כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after אָמַ֣ר <WH559> had said בִּלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> as Balaam וַיַּ֛עַל <WH5927> and offered פָּ֥ר <WH6499> a bullock וָאַ֖יִל <WH352> and a ram בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> on [every] altar
